element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text:
This algorithm places points on lines at a given distance measured from the start of the line along it.
Distances are entered using a table, which contains an identifier of the corresponding line and the distance at which the point is to be added. Multiple points can be added to a single line.

element.name: ADDITIONAL_INFO
element.text: Development of this algorithm was funded by Deputación de Pontevedra

element.name: FIELD
element.text: The field from the lines layer attributes table that contains the identifier of each line.

element.name: TABLE
element.text: The table with distances and names of the lines to which points should be added. Distances should be expressed in map units. Line identifiers are case-sensitive.

element.name: RESULT
element.text: The resulting layer with points added at the given distances.
